talk1.dialogue: Hmm? Was she not your style? But you two seemed so cute together.
Oh well, these things happen sometimes. I can't force you to date Aaliyah.
Too bad though, she was the hottest milf around the park.
Well, since you denied to be Aaliyah's partner, do you wish to meet other bachelors? You haven't been to the city after all.
You're also free to give up if you decide you're too bad at dating! Fwie fwie fwie fwie!
I'm kidding, but the choise is yours. What will it be, young fellow?

Press W to give up on love.
Press S to Keep trying and go to the city.

happy.dialogue: Let's go to the city. You haven't been there yet.
